body:

> and therefore no
> incentive to produce new media.

http://gonze.com/weblog/story/1-25-7 -- People pay to create, so their
must be some non-financial incentive going on there.



Two false statements.  Or massive overstatements, giving one the benefit
of the doubt.




The site is a good idea though.
